mapper.select: SELECT id, Date, Passed, Failed_TR,Failed_Environment,Failed_Artifact,Inconclusive,Comment, G1_LTE_UP, G2_LTE_UP,Effectiveness,Stability FROM listp1104
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO listp1104(Date, Passed, Failed_TR,Failed_Environment,Failed_Artifact,Inconclusive,Comment, G1_LTE_UP, G2_LTE_UP,Effectiveness,Stability) VALUES(#{listp1104.date}, #{listp1104.passed}, #{listp1104.failed_TR},#{listp1104.failed_Environment}, #{listp1104.failed_Artifact},#{listp1104.inconclusive},#{listp1104.comment},#{listp1104.g1_LTE_UP},#{listp1104.g2_LTE_UP},#{listp1104.effectiveness},#{listp1104.stability})
mapper.update: update LISTP1104 SET Date=#{list.date}, Passed=#{list.passed}, Failed_TR=#{list.failed_TR}, Failed_Environment=#{list.failed_Environment}, Failed_Artifact=#{list.failed_Artifact}, Inconclusive=#{list.inconclusive}, Comment=#{list.comment}, G1_LTE_UP=#{list.g1_LTE_UP}, G2_LTE_UP=#{list.g2_LTE_UP}, Effectiveness=#{list.effectiveness}, Stability=#{list.stability} WHERE id=#{list.id}
